abstract: ESPN made the right decision to let go of Hank Williams Jr., but have they learned their lesson? William C. Rhoden on what ESPN should do next after the Williams controversy.
snippet: ESPN made the right decision to let go of Hank Williams Jr., but have they learned their lesson? William C. Rhoden on what ESPN should do next after the Williams controversy.
lead_paragraph: ESPN made the right decision to let go of Hank Williams Jr., but have they learned their lesson? William C. Rhoden on what ESPN should do next after the Williams controversy.

headline.main: Rhoden: Are You Ready for Some Change?
